metric.name: rebalancesInProgress
metric.description: Current number of cache rebalance operations being directed by this process.

metric.name: rebalancesCompleted
metric.description: Total number of cache rebalance operations directed by this process.

metric.name: rebalanceTime
metric.description: Total time spent directing cache rebalance operations.

metric.name: rebalanceBucketCreatesInProgress
metric.description: Current number of bucket create operations being directed for rebalancing.

metric.name: rebalanceBucketCreatesCompleted
metric.description: Total number of bucket create operations directed for rebalancing.

metric.name: rebalanceBucketCreatesFailed
metric.description: Total number of bucket create operations directed for rebalancing that failed.

metric.name: rebalanceBucketCreateTime
metric.description: Total time spent directing bucket create operations for rebalancing.

metric.name: rebalanceBucketCreateBytes
metric.description: Total bytes created while directing bucket create operations for rebalancing.

metric.name: rebalanceBucketTransfersInProgress
metric.description: Current number of bucket transfer operations being directed for rebalancing.

metric.name: rebalanceBucketTransfersCompleted
metric.description: Total number of bucket transfer operations directed for rebalancing.

metric.name: rebalanceBucketTransfersFailed
metric.description: Total number of bucket transfer operations directed for rebalancing that failed.

metric.name: rebalanceBucketTransfersTime
metric.description: Total time spent directing bucket transfer operations for rebalancing.

metric.name: rebalanceBucketTransfersBytes
metric.description: Total bytes transfered while directing bucket transfer operations for rebalancing.

metric.name: rebalancePrimaryTransfersInProgress
metric.description: Current number of primary transfer operations being directed for rebalancing.

metric.name: rebalancePrimaryTransfersCompleted
metric.description: Total number of primary transfer operations directed for rebalancing.

metric.name: rebalancePrimaryTransfersFailed
metric.description: Total number of primary transfer operations directed for rebalancing that failed.

metric.name: rebalancePrimaryTransferTime
metric.description: Total time spent directing primary transfer operations for rebalancing.

metric.name: rebalanceMembershipChanges
metric.description: The number of times that membership has changed during a rebalance

metric.name: heapCriticalEvents
metric.description: Number of times incoming cache activities were blocked due to heap use going over the critical threshold.

metric.name: heapSafeEvents
metric.description: Number of times incoming cache activities were unblocked due to heap use going under the critical threshold.

metric.name: evictionStartEvents
metric.description: Number of times eviction activities were started due to the heap use going over the eviction threshold.

metric.name: evictMoreEvents
metric.description: Total number of times evict more event was delivered.

metric.name: evictionStopEvents
metric.description: Number of times eviction activities were stopped due to the heap use going below the eviction threshold.

metric.name: criticalThreshold
metric.description: The cache resource-manager setting critical-heap-percentage.

metric.name: evictionThreshold
metric.description: The cache resource-manager setting eviction-heap-percentage.

metric.name: tenuredHeapUsed
metric.description: Percentage of tenured heap currently in use.

metric.name: resourceEventsDelivered
metric.description: Total number of resource events delivered to listeners

metric.name: resourceEventQueueSize
metric.description: Pending events for thresholdEventProcessor thread

metric.name: thresholdEventProcessorThreadJobs
metric.description: Number of jobs currently being processed by the thresholdEventProcessorThread
